complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Initialize TypeScript Project with Strict Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into detailed configuration steps for each tool (pnpm, tsconfig, ESLint, Prettier) with verification commands.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Straightforward setup tasks with clear steps and existing subtasks. Low cognitive complexity, mostly configuration file creation and package installation. Dependencies are minimal.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Define Core TypeScript Interfaces and Types
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create separate files for each domain (lead, audit, campaign) with comprehensive JSDoc and type validation tests.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Type definition work with moderate complexity due to cross-references and composite types. Well-defined structure reduces cognitive load. Existing subtasks provide good breakdown.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail Zod schema creation, singleton pattern implementation, and comprehensive error message generation for each config section.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves Zod schema complexity, singleton pattern, and error handling. Moderate cognitive complexity but well-scoped with clear validation requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Error Handling Utilities and Base Error Classes
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Document each error type's usage scenarios and create comprehensive error mapping from external APIs.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Systematic class hierarchy creation. Low algorithmic complexity, moderate design complexity for proper inheritance and serialization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create detailed validation rules for edge cases, custom transformers, and comprehensive test coverage for each schema.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex nested Zod schemas with transforms, refinements, and custom validation logic. Higher cognitive complexity due to interdependent type relationships.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup MCP Client Wrapper for Puppeteer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail MCP protocol integration, connection lifecycle management, and stealth plugin configuration specifics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to external MCP protocol integration, connection management, stealth features, and error recovery. Multiple failure modes.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup MCP Client Wrapper for Supabase
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Specify PostgREST query building patterns, transaction isolation levels, and storage bucket permission handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex database client wrapper with query building, transactions, storage operations, and type inference. High integration complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup MCP Client Wrapper for Mailgun
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail Mailgun API rate limit handling, webhook signature verification algorithm, and batch recipient validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: External API integration with rate limiting, webhook security, and batch processing. Moderate to high complexity due to external service dependencies.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup MCP Client Wrapper for Google Calendar
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement OAuth token refresh logic, timezone conversion utilities, and availability slot generation algorithm.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: OAuth complexity, timezone handling, and availability calculation. Moderate complexity with external calendar API integration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Include RLS policy definitions, trigger functions for audit trails, and comprehensive index analysis.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: SQL schema design with constraints, indexes, and relationships. Moderate complexity requiring database normalization knowledge.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Lead Repository for Data Persistence
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail query optimization strategies, transaction boundaries, and deduplication normalization logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex CRUD with search, pagination, bulk operations, and deduplication. High data layer complexity with query optimization needs.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define complete state machine transitions, webhook callback registration patterns, and history query optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: State machine complexity with validation, history tracking, and webhook integration. Moderate to high business logic complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Specify file format validation regexes, signed URL expiration strategies, and orphaned file cleanup cron logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: File storage with validation, signed URLs, and cleanup. Moderate complexity with storage-specific concerns.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Optimize SQL queries for funnel metrics, implement cache invalidation strategies, and detail time-series bucketing logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex SQL aggregations, time-series queries, and caching. High analytical query complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Google Maps Scraper with Puppeteer MCP
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail network interception patterns, scroll detection algorithms, and JSON response parsing selectors.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity: web scraping, network interception, scrolling logic, anti-detection. Fragile external dependency.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create regex patterns for phone/address normalization, validation rule sets, and error categorization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Data transformation and normalization. Moderate complexity with regex and validation logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define scoring formula weights, configurable rule sets, and edge case handling for qualification logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Rule-based scoring system. Low to moderate algorithmic complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Lead Discovery with Data Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement pipeline error boundaries, progress reporting hooks, and partial result handling strategies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Orchestration of multiple services with error handling and progress tracking. Moderate integration complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Configure Lighthouse CDP categories, coverage collection timing, and performance score calculation weights.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex performance tooling integration with CDP, coverage analysis, and scoring. High technical complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define accessibility tree traversal algorithms, WCAG rule mappings, and severity scoring formulas.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex DOM tree analysis, WCAG compliance checking, and reporting. High domain-specific complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Specify canvas annotation algorithms, video frame extraction timing, and format conversion logic.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Screenshot/video capture with annotation. Moderate complexity with media processing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define viewport breakpoint logic, touch target measurement algorithms, and layout shift detection.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multi-viewport testing with issue detection. Moderate complexity with cross-device analysis.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Audit Engine with Data Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail audit orchestration sequence, partial result merging logic, and batch concurrency controls.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex orchestration of multiple analysis modules with persistence. High integration complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement Handlebars helper functions, variable resolution precedence, and template validation rules.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Template engine with variable substitution and conditionals. Moderate templating complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define sequence state machine, condition evaluation logic, and capacity throttling algorithms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex campaign orchestration with scheduling, conditions, and capacity management. High business logic complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Specify webhook signature verification, event routing patterns, and reply intent detection.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Webhook processing with event routing and state updates. Moderate complexity with real-time concerns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Google Calendar for Meeting Booking
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement availability slot generation algorithm, double-booking prevention, and timezone conversion.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Calendar integration with availability and booking logic. Moderate complexity with time handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail Vite configuration options, Tailwind theme customization, and React Query provider setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard React setup with common tooling. Low complexity, mostly configuration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement table virtualization, filter state synchronization, and bulk action confirmation flows.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex React UI with table, filters, bulk actions. Moderate to high frontend complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Specify chart configurations, modal state management, PDF generation layout, and compare delta calculations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex data visualization with charts, gallery, PDF export, and comparison. High UI complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail real-time data synchronization, funnel visualization math, and responsive grid layouts.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Real-time dashboard with multiple charts and metrics. High frontend visualization complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Implement rich text editor integrations, file upload validation, and tab state persistence.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multiple settings forms with rich editors and file uploads. Moderate UI complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail session persistence strategies, RLS policy definitions, and protected route patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication with context, protected routes, and RLS. Moderate auth complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create test data factories, mock external service scenarios, and visual regression baseline setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive E2E testing across full workflows. High complexity due to test orchestration and mocking.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Profile specific bottlenecks, implement caching layers, and define performance budgets with monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Performance profiling, optimization, and load testing. High complexity requiring deep system knowledge.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Error Handling and Retry Logic Implementation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Define retry classification rules, circuit breaker state transitions, and chaos testing scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: System-wide resilience patterns. High complexity due to distributed error handling.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Include architecture diagrams, API schema examples, and step-by-step deployment screenshots.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Documentation writing. Low technical complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup CI/CD Pipeline with GitHub Actions
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Configure matrix testing, artifact caching, and deployment approval gates.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: CI/CD pipeline configuration. Moderate DevOps complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Rate Limiting and Anti-Detection Measures
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail token bucket math, stealth plugin configurations, and block detection heuristics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Advanced anti-detection and rate limiting. Very high complexity due to evasion techniques.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Document security checklist, penetration test scenarios, and compliance verification procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security hardening across entire system. High complexity requiring security expertise.
